title: Topnaca Utralight Outdoor TPU Inflatable Sleeping Pad with Pillow, Comfortable Mattress Camp Pad, for Camping, Backpacking, Hiking (Green)
feature: - ULTRALIGHT & COMPACT : Folded size tiny as a water bottle, weighs only 1.02 lbs, R value 1.3 (minimal insulation), come with a storage case for easy carrying, inflated size 72.8 x 21.2 x 1.2in(185 x 54 x 3cm)

- ULTRALIGHT & COMPACT : Folded size tiny as a water bottle, weighs only 1.02 lbs, R value 1.3 (minimal insulation), come with a storage case for easy carrying, inflated size 72.8 x 21.2 x 1.2in(185 x 54 x 3cm)
- EASY TO INFLATE & DEFLATE: Mouth inflation incredibly requires only 9 -12 full breaths and deflation is just in seconds.

- ECONOMICAL & COMFORT : The new technologic design "Egg-tray construction"; This air pad is designed for minimalist backpacking,hiking, camping and scout. It provide basic comfort and save you from bulky foam pad
- QUALITY MATERIAL: 20D nylon fabric and extruded TPU coating gives you a durable and long-lasting sleeping pad, it will offer more comfort when used it in sleeping bag, cot or hammock
